text: Ke kaloku abo babenqwenela ukuba sesikhundleni sakhe ngezolo baqala bathi: “O, uAllâh Wandisa imbonelelo yaKhe kulowo Athande (ukumandisela) kwizicaka zakhe. Aze Ayincitshe (kulowo Athande ukuyincitsha kuye)! Ukuba ngaba uAllâh Ebengathululanga ubabalo lwaKhe phezu kwethu, ngesenze saginywa (nathi). Inene, abangakholwayo abanampumelelo!”
